title: [Combo Skin Ideas] Riot can we Finally have a New Amumu Skin?
body:
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/288/9/2/amumu_skin_concepts_by_cheo36-d82xzt7.jpg

Personally my favorite one is the one in the middle.

http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/297/e/f/amumu_skin_idea_by_ms05zaku-d841mww.jpg

http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/088/d/9/amumu_fan_art_lol_by_jets0n-d5znm95.jpg

replies.body:
Well his critical attack already makes him breakdance so I love that one - particularly the Ult! But what sort of secret ninja school would accept Amumu? The dude is a total downer and I'm not sure Ninjas can even cry - refer to the original master of the AMA: [Ask A Ninja](http://youtu.be/gWQ8ec3ogBM)

Our poor mummy pal definitely needs a new skin though, no wonder he's so sad >:D
Crying is not a handicap. He could easily get a Ninja job in the onion cutting department.

> [{quoted}](name=Rozzeta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ksE45OfX,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-03-07T23:04:25.144+0000)
>
> Crying is not a handicap. He could easily get a Ninja job in the onion cutting department.

like for real, you have no idea how many times I've seen Naruto cry.

Haha that's true. Ah Naruto, what a guy. He wears a bright orange jumpsuit, yells all the time, only knows a couple of moves and yet still manages to be the best in town. I guess it depends if Amumu wants to be a traditional Ninja (wear all black, moves through the shadows silently, kill without hesitation, hate pirates) or whatever it is Naruto is.

Maybe we could rename Bandage Toss to Sennen Goroshi >:D
is this a naruto amumu skin leak by chance :0
#NarutoFTW

Logged in to up-vote and comment.

Love Ask a Ninja, you're now my favorite Rioter, since you know of its existence. (It's hilarious, I don't know why it's not more popular.)

I look forward to -  well, nevermind that. You're awesome. c:

Oh dude Ask a Ninja makes me laugh so much. When it comes to the internet and the weirdly wonderful content, I either know about it or want to. It's my favourite place to be!

I hope that sentence went something like 'I look forward to future on the boards' and not 'I look forward to driving through three states wearing your head as a hat' >:P

Kindle can you check out my champion concept I want your honest opinion http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/ihZmv0Zg-champion-concept-levi-the-half-kraken

. I always admire what you say, this is my second thread you've commented. The first one was about Shyvana (: it would be a honor to have your opinion about my champion concept idea.

Even if you're by chance not a part of the whole champion concept I still think your opinions matters best
Well, darn. There go my vacation plans. :p

a riot reply, the brightens the heart of every {{champion:32}}

It's a less well-known style of fighting. Drunken monkey uses deception into letting an opponants guard down.
Crying mummy style is even more deadly as is evidenced by never leaving survivors. (See music vid)

Let's take a look at Amumu, really quickly.

1.  Amumu is a sad child
2.  Amumu's tears help him defeat his enemies.

So, given that, I would propose a "Bindings of Amumu" skin, something in homage to "The Binding of Isaac" Rogue-like game.  (No, I don't mean "naked Amumu."  That's just wrong in so many ways, you awful people...)

Riot could also work with Nicalis to create a character for THAT game or buy them out and produce a "Bindings of Amumu" game for April Fool's day...

Hell, we already have a sequel's name that's just itching to be used: "The [Dark] Bindings of Morgana."   Geez, why is such a golden opportunity being wasted?

I think his model could use an update. Didn't he used to be a Yordle? I think now he's a human boy, so maybe his model could be updated to have better proportions, this would make a lot of skins look better on him.

> [{quoted}](name=aaronconlin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ksE45OfX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-07T01:58:35.666+0000)
>
> I think his model could use an update. Didn't he used to be a Yordle? I think now he's a human boy, so maybe his model could be updated to have better proportions, this would make a lot of skins look better on him.

He still is a yordle.

He is? His lore was changed with the Shurima lore retcon

"Amumu is a diminutive, animated cadaver who wanders the world, trying to discover his true identity. He rose from an ancient Shuriman tomb bound in corpse wrappings with no knowledge of his past, consumed with an uncontrollable sadness."

And the Curse of the Sad Mummy song refers to him as a "boy"

On his character page it still says Bandle City, so I'm not really sure.

> [{quoted}](name=aaronconlin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ksE45OfX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-07T02:14:04.861+0000)
>
> He is? His lore was changed with the Shurima lore retcon
> 
> "Amumu is a diminutive, animated cadaver who wanders the world, trying to discover his true identity. He rose from an ancient Shuriman tomb bound in corpse wrappings with no knowledge of his past, consumed with an uncontrollable sadness."
> 
> And the Curse of the Sad Mummy song refers to him as a "boy"
> 
> On his character page it still says Bandle City, so I'm not really sure.

oh shit I thought he was a yordle but if he's a boy then he should totally be changed and be similar with Annie
His new lore never directly states what he is.

In the behind-the-scenes documentary of how they made that song, they (briefly) showed some of the concept art for that part where his bandages tore off.
Although they covered it up with cloth in the final release, he clearly had dog like ears.
So he is DEFINITELY still a yordle.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4bQBmAO0hk4
At 35:15

Amumu debuted as a mummy boy searching for his parents. He and annie's original model shared the same proportions: large head, tiny torso and suction cup feet. Lore was then changed to make him a lonely yordle searching for friends (yordles tending to go crazy when isolated i.e. teemo and veigar). And if the pbe lore remains canon, now changed to a mummy boy prince but throwing the suggestion of a yordle in his lore in homage to his past rewrite.
I think I read somewhere that they changed it because the idea of an undead child was too morbid or something
B-Boy Amumu would be the greatest skin of all time. Maybe the boombox could play like, Curse of the Sad Mummy or something.
lol, or chocolate rain
We need a A Moo-moo skin (sad cow)
Bump, love the B-Boy mummy idea, would buy! Poor Amumu needs some loving!

Orrrr we can have this theme..
From Challenger {{champion:103}} ,
Golden {{champion:12}}, 
Now there can be Bronze {{champion:32}} 

All 3 are ranks, and all start with "A". It needs to happen now lol.

LOL POOR AMUMU
I really like the B-Boy Mummy skin and I would buy it for sure

What about an amumu skin based off of king Midas and the gold touch
Q:golden bandage
W:golden tears
E:golden bandages
R:turns everyone to gold

> [{quoted}](name=WizardBlock,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ksE45OfX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-07T14:54:23.637+0000)
>
> What about an amumu skin based off of king Midas and the gold touch
> R:turns everyone to gold

I think that is a bad idea. We already have one (and soon two) abilities that turn people to gold, and those are Stasis effects, not Stuns. Not being able to tell at a glance that someone is invulnerable would annoy people.
cool
Bump this shit needs to be seen!!
